text: <@U01F158EECF> - I recommend starting off with C.A.'s Notes on The Synthesis of Form. It takes technical topic of design, form, and function, and orients it around human value, but on a technical way such that the form and design of things is derived directly from the human / natural needs (as opposed to being a "good" design for artificial reasons)

elements.text: - I recommend starting off with C.A.'s Notes on The Synthesis of Form. It takes technical topic of design, form, and function, and orients it around human value, but on a technical way such that the form and design of things is derived directly from the human / natural needs (as opposed to being a "good" design for artificial reasons)

text: But definitely do dive into Nature of Order!

elements.text: But definitely do dive into Nature of Order!
